title: Matchday: Inside FC Barcelona
overview: FC Barcelona and Rakuten present Matchday, a new documentary series in which viewers will get to enjoy exclusive never-seen-before footage of Ernesto Valverde's squad. For the first time ever, TV cameras were allowed to film the everyday lives of players such as Leo Messi, Gerard Piqué, Marc-André ter Stegen and Luis Suárez, offering a more intimate portrait of them both during competition and in their personal lives. Inside FC Barcelona follows the famed football club through its 2018-2019 season.
